metadata.synopsis: Darkness causes death in SCL. As such, Haven npcs consider dousing torches as a crime. This crime has one warning.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load into SCL, go to Haven, douse one of stationary torches in front of an npc.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The denizens of Last Light are fed up with your reckless torch-dousing in the face of the shadow curse.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *Beware - this is the only warning you'll get in Last Light about the crime of dousing a torch.*

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *Where torches protect mortal souls from a shadow curse, dousing one is considered a crime.*
